column4: When I try to run the LIVECD it comes up as a nongui. When i type in gparted into the console it says cannot open display.
usually ubuntu would come up as a GUI now it doesnt
i type in startx and it doesnt work
type the program name
gparted?
do sudo gparted
same thing "cannot open display"
gparted must run as root, therefore sudo gparted
I'm on the LiveCD and it says that it cannot be displayed with sudo gparted
oh I am not sure how to use gparted w/ the live cd... what are you trying to do?
trying to make some partition changes
Is Windows your main install Shervin ?
yeah vista for now
Vista Premium?
home premium
yea
ahhh... :(
are there any non-gui partition editors on the livecd
yeah but it doesnt owrk for me because my screen isn't detected
oh parted.
you know there is a tool within vista premium for partition changes
